p: Domain III of the ZIKV-envelope protein (EDIII) shares 29% amino-acid identity with DENV-EDIII and 90% of EDIII-antibodies (EDIII-Abs) elicited by ZIKV infection are virus specific [ 17]. ZIKV EDIII-Abs tested in ELISA do not bind to DENV-2 or West-Nile virus (WNV) -EDIII [ 18]. Studies in mice have shown that treatment with EDIII-Abs protect against ZIKV infection [ 19] by neutralizing the virus [ 18].
